Maven Jenkins Plugin
Last Published: 2013-11-04  | Version: 1.106
Maven Jenkins Plugin
Project Documentation
  • Project Information
  • Project Reports

hpi:create

Full name:

org.jenkins-ci.tools:maven-hpi-plugin:1.106:create

Description:

Builds a new plugin template. Most of this is really just a rip-off from the archetype:create goal, but since Maven doesn't really let one Mojo calls another Mojo, this turns out to be the easiest.

Attributes:

Optional Parameters

Name Type Since Description
artifactId String - (no description)
User property is: artifactId.
groupId String - (no description)
User property is: groupId.
packageName String - (no description)
User property is: packageName.
pomRemoteRepositories List - (no description)
Default value is: ${project.remoteArtifactRepositories}.
remoteRepositories String - (no description)
User property is: remoteRepositories.
version String - (no description)
Default value is: 1.0-SNAPSHOT.
User property is: version.

  • Required: No
  • User Property: artifactId

(no description)
  • Type: java.util.List
  • Required: No
  • Default: ${project.remoteArtifactRepositories}

(no description)
  • Type: java.lang.String
  • Required: No
  • User Property: remoteRepositories

(no description)
  • Type: java.lang.String
  • Required: No
  • User Property: version
  • Default: 1.0-SNAPSHOT
